summary.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

span.span: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define geometric shapes.

summary.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

span.span: objects can be used for clipping, hit-testing, and rendering 2-D graphic data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相較於圖形的幾何Geometry Compared to Shape 類別具有， ，和其他屬性呈現和其衍生的類別缺少。The class has a , , and other rendering properties that and its derived classes lack. 類別是，並因此參與版面配置系統，其衍生的類別可用來支援任何元素的內容當做子系。The class is a and therefore participates in the layout system; its derived classes can be used as the content of any element that supports children. 類別，相反地，只需定義圖形的幾何，而無法呈現其本身。The class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of a shape, and cannot render itself. 其單純性，因為它具有更廣泛的使用。Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為唯讀以改善所做的多個物件之間共用效能、 複製，並變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

span.para: 雖然此類別是抽象的但是不公開可延伸。
Although this class is abstract, it is not publicly extensible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用預設的容錯因數 (描述屬性) 時合併幾何。This method uses the default tolerance factor (described by the property) when combining geometries. 若要指定您自己的容錯因數，請使用方法。To specify your own tolerance factor, use the method. 有些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點在此多邊形的近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值會產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型的容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用時，應該牽涉到仔細思考執行聯集，因為它可以是非常耗費 CPU 資源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大部分情況下，或好的效果。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用只任何時則適用下列步驟：Use only when any of the following apply: - 幾何作業不是等位。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中一個幾何已的值和幾何是自我交集 (也就是實際上很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 時間不是個問題，但名額 （比方說，如果幾何是建立一次，並且接著快取）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常會產生較小的輸出，比。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 將圖案或路徑動畫中使用產生的幾何和不提供所需的外框。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點在此多邊形的近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值會產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型的容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor. 使用時，應該牽涉到仔細思考執行聯集，因為它可以是非常耗費 CPU 資源。Careful thought should be involved when using to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive. 在大部分情況下，或好的效果。In most cases, a or will work better. 使用只任何時則適用下列步驟：Use only when any of the following apply: - 幾何作業不是等位。The geometric operation is not a union. - 其中一個幾何已的值和幾何是自我交集 (也就是實際上很重要)。Either of the geometries has a value of and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the actually matters). - 時間不是個問題，但名額 （比方說，如果幾何是建立一次，並且接著快取）。Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached). 通常會產生較小的輸出，比。Typically, produces smaller output than . - 將圖案或路徑動畫中使用產生的幾何和不提供所需的外框。The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and does not provide the desired outline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點在此多邊形的近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值會產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型的容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

span.span: Gets a that is a polygonal approximation of the object.

param.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.

span.span: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.

param.span: If tolerance is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些方法 (例如) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。Some methods (such as ) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry. 容錯因數指定點在此多邊形的近似值之間的最大距離。The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation. 較小的容錯值會產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理程序比使用大型的容錯因數的近似值。Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的物件沒有轉換值，這個方法會傳回身分識別轉換。This method returns the identity transformation if the current object has no transformation value. 否則，它會傳回套用至目前的物件。Otherwise, it returns the applied to the current object. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，將套用到物件。The following example shows how to use the property to apply a to a object. 此範例會使用若要從三個建立複合圖案物件，然後再旋轉 45 度的幾何使用屬性。The example uses a to create a composite shape from three objects and then rotates the geometry 45 degrees by using the property.
